messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] politics and the court system
messages.msgSnippet: The page I m linking to has 5 School House Rock videos explaining government in one place - http://tr.im/kJCX The page is a little schooly but the videos are
messages.messageBody:
The page I'm linking to has 5 School House Rock videos explaining government
in one place -

http://tr.im/kJCX

The page is a little schooly but the videos are fun and catchy.

Lauren

messages.msgSnippet: I ve enjoyed the new Raising the Bar which follows a young public defender. Robin B.

defender.

Robin B.

messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] politics and the court system
messages.msgSnippet: Watching any of the Law and Order shows would be a good way to learn about the court system and even politics.  I myself have learned a lot from them.   BB,
messages.messageBody:
Watching any of the Law and Order shows would be a good way to learn about the court system and even politics.  I myself have learned a lot from them.
 
BB,
Chrissie

"All you have to decide is what to do with the time you have been given." Gandalf

--- On Mon, 5/4/09, Pam Sorooshian <pamsoroosh@...> wrote:


From: Pam Sorooshian <pamsoroosh@...>
Subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] politics and the court system
To: AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com
Date: Monday, May 4, 2009, 5:01 PM










On 5/4/2009 12:30 PM, Lyla Wolfenstein wrote:
> my 10 year old is now interested in learning about current american politics and the court system. he wants me to read stuff with him, primarily, although i bet good video resources would be fun too. any suggestions?
> Lyla
>

The West Wing!! He might be a bit young for it, but if he's interested
in politics, it might be just right for him.

-pam


















[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.messageBody:
On 5/4/2009 12:30 PM, Lyla Wolfenstein wrote:
> my 10 year old is now interested in learning about current american politics and the court system. he wants me to read stuff with him, primarily, although i bet good video resources would be fun too. any suggestions?
> Lyla
>

The West Wing!! He might be a bit young for it, but if he's interested
in politics, it might be just right for him.

-pam

messages.subject: politics and the court system
messages.msgSnippet: my 10 year old is now interested in learning about current american politics and the court system.  he wants me to read stuff with him, primarily, although i
messages.messageBody:
my 10 year old is now interested in learning about current american politics and the court system. he wants me to read stuff with him, primarily, although i bet good video resources would be fun too. any suggestions?
Lyla
